title: The Fake Heart
description: St. Mary's Academy was supposed to be Emery Miller's one chance at having a bright future. She had everything planned out--until she finds herself caught in the middle of a battle between two people claiming to be alchemists.Now in a twist of fate, Emery's life is saved by the one thing that killed her. Alchemy. And possessing a fake heart, she must train to become an alchemist and team up with Dove, a former alchemist who claims that the only true way to save Emery's heart is to search for a fragment of a very powerful substance: the Elixir. To make things worse...Emery might find herself falling for the alchemist that killed her. Fake heart or not, it doesn't make falling in love any easier, does it?
author: Allice Revelle
